content.raw: Nate, please, update at the same time the [ign_math-release](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign_math-release) to ignition-math-release so we keep in sync and working the conventions for releasing tools. I will take care of renaming jenkins jobs.
content.html: Nate, please, update at the same time the ign_math-release to ignition-math-release so we keep in sync and working the conventions for releasing tools. I will take care of renaming jenkins jobs.

update.description:
* Fix windows build. [Jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_math-default-devel-windows7/49/)

* There were inconsistencies in the API, which are now fixed.

* 100% line code coverage!!!

After this pull-request, we will release Version 1.0.0 of ign_math. If you're interested, there is a [branch in gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/branch/ign_math_3.1) that uses ign_math.
update.title: Fix windows build & Fix API

content.raw: I just saw a minor typo and another underscore to be changed. Fixed in a47bd20.
content.html: I just saw a minor typo and another underscore to be changed. Fixed in a47bd20.

content.raw:
There's still a few style errors in the [latest drone build](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign_math/192):
~~~
./src/Rand_TEST.cc:56:  Blank line at the end of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [3]
./src/Rand.cc:36:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./src/Rand.cc:43:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./src/Rand.cc:43:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:57:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:57:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:223:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:223:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
~~~
content.html:
There's still a few style errors in the latest drone build:

./src/Rand_TEST.cc:56:  Blank line at the end of a code block.  Is this needed?  [whitespace/blank_line] [3]
./src/Rand.cc:36:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./src/Rand.cc:43:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./src/Rand.cc:43:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:57:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:57:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:223:  You don't need a ; after a }  [readability/braces] [4]
./include/ignition/math/Filter.hh:223:  Missing space before {  [whitespace/braces] [5]

content.html: Added an ifdef around the test because I can't resolve the problem.
